project_name.justification: C2C Metals Corp. (CSE: CTOC) today reports the acquisition, through staking, of the Sun Uranium Project located in easternmost Utah...

company_name.justification: The article clearly identifies the acquiring company: 'C2C Metals Corp. (CSE: CTOC) today reports the acquisition, through staking, of the Sun Uranium Project'. This contradicts the authoritative metadata.

ceo_buyer.justification: The Company also advises that Jason Bagg, Chief Executive Officer, will present on Tuesday April 30th, 2024...

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The acquisition was made 'through staking', which typically implies 100% interest, but no specific percentage is mentioned in the text.

primary_commodity.justification: C2C Metals Stakes Uranium Claims in the Prolific Uravan District, Utah

verified_article_link.justification: The article is titled 'C2C Metals Stakes Uranium Claims in the Prolific Uravan District, Utah' and describes the acquisition of the Sun Uranium Project by C2C Metals Corp.

currency.justification: The buyer, C2C Metals Corp., is listed on the Canadian Securities Exchange (CSE: CTOC) and based in Vancouver, BC. The currency is inferred to be Canadian Dollars (CAD) as is common for companies on this exchange.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The acquisition was 'through staking' and no cash consideration paid to a third party is mentioned in the text.

share_payments_raw.justification: The acquisition was 'through staking' and no share consideration is mentioned in the text.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The acquisition was 'through staking' and no combined cash and share consideration is mentioned in the text.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The acquisition was 'through staking' and no issuance of shares is mentioned as part of the transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options are mentioned as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters is mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text mentions a recommendation for future exploration but does not specify a binding financial commitment for the acquisition.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) is mentioned as being acquired or retained as part of the transaction.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The Sun Uranium Property consists of 120 claims, covering almost 4 square miles...

coverage_area_unit.justification: The Sun Uranium Property consists of 120 claims, covering almost 4 square miles...

resource_size.value: 32,100 lbs. U3O8, at an average grade of 0.20% U3O8
resource_size.justification: An early non-compliant historical resource estimate made using data from the 23 drill holes was 32,100 lbs. U3O8, at an average grade of 0.20% U3O8.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified in the text as 'C2C Metals Corp. (CSE: CTOC)'.
